GV06kaussu_u:3838: || bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso brahmaṇaḥ putro viśve devāḥ pra dadur viśvam ejat |
GV06kaussu_u:3839: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ bṛhaspataya āṅgirasāya svāhā || yasya te 'nnaṃ na kṣīyate bhūya
GV06kaussu_u:3841: yasmai bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvam etat pratiṣṭhitam |

GV06kaussu_u:3843: || mukhaṃ devānām iha yo babhūva yo jānāti vayunānāṃ samīpe |
GV06kaussu_u:3844: yasmai hutaṃ devatā bhakṣayanti vāyunetraḥ supraṇītiḥ sunītiḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3845: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśam agnaye svāhā || yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ cyāvayann eti vṛkṣān prabhañjanena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3846: rasān gandhān bhāvayann eti devo mātariśvā bhūtabhavyasya kartā |
GV06kaussu_u:3847: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ vāyave svāhā || brahmacārī carati brahmacaryam ṛcaṃ gāthāṃ brahma paraṃ jigāṃsan |
GV06kaussu_u:3848: taṃ vighnā anupariyanti sarve ye antarikṣe ye ca divi śritāsaḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3849: taṃ viśo anuparyanti sarvāḥ karmāṇi loke parimohayanti |
GV06kaussu_u:3850: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśam ādityāya svāhā || yo nakṣatraiḥ sarathaṃ yāti devaḥ saṃsiddhena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3852: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ candrāya svāhā || oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr yaśasvinīḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3853: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśam oṣadhībhyaḥ somarājñībhyaḥ svāhā || oṣadhayo varuṇarājñīr yaśasvinīḥ |
GV06kaussu_u:3854: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśam oṣadhībhyo varuṇarājñībhyaḥ svāhā || aṣṭasthūṇo daśapakṣo yadṛchajo vanaspate |

GV06kaussu_u:3993: [6.58.1]> <girāv aragarāṭeṣu (ed.: arāgarāṭeṣu) [6.69.1]> <yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane [9.1.11]> <yac ca varco akṣeṣu [14.1.35]> <yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam [14.1.36]>_svāhā_ity agnau hutvā (KauśS_14,3[139].16) raseṣu saṃpātān ānīya saṃsthāpya homān
